concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Class)-[r:DECLARES]->(m) RETURN t, r as rel, m
MATCH (t:Class)-[r:DECLARES]->(m) RETURN t, {role: "relationship", type:"DECLARES", startNode:startNode(r), endNode:endNode(r), properties: { name : m.name }} as rel, m

concept.description: A type with methods as subgraph
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Class), (t)-[:DECLARES]->(m1:Method) OPTIONAL MATCH (m1)-[i:INVOKES]->(m2:Method) WITH t, collect(m1) as methods, collect(i) as invocations RETURN {role: "graph", parent: t, nodes: methods, relationships: invocations} as subgraph

concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Class:Type)-[d:DECLARES]->(c:Method:Constructor) RETURN t as t1, t as t2, d as d1, d as d2, c as c1, c as c2
